Package ChocAn

Class DataCenter

java.lang.Object
ChocAn.DataCenter
public class DataCenter extends Object
The DataCenter class. This class stores the various accounts used by the software. Additionally, it also stores which services are offered and records of the services that have been provided.
Author:
Nicholas Seidl
